data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 28970
data.actual_result: The keyboard blinking cursor is stuck there and I cannot type
data.expected_result: The keyboard blinking cursor is not supposed to be stuck and should be transferred to the new modal
data.short_description: On Edge, pressing Find or Start a conversation will cause it to have the keyboard blinking cursor and you cannot type
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Discord through Edge - Press Home on the top left (Should be a white logo of Discord) - Click on the Find or start a conversation - You will notice that the keyboard blinking cursor is stuck there and is not transferred to the new modal that opens up - You will notice that you cannot type either!!!
